QuestData.Title: Debriefing
QuestData.Description: This soldier was near death, but I fear we do not have the time to await his full recovery. He has information we desperately need to know.$b$bBe patient with him, but keep him talking until we've learned all that we can.$b$bWith luck we might discover just what we're up against...
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Private Pollard and learn about his ordeal.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, it's not encouraging, but it's something...
